cause.description:
My name is Chet Bednar and this fall I am running a marathon in Dublin Ireland for The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. My goal is to raise $5,200 for the society to help find a cure for cancer.
My honored hero is Maia, a little girl of 8 years who was diagnosed with blood cancer last year.
Help me find a cure for cancer by supporting my race.
1. Train, Endure, Achieve, Matter
cause.mission: Find a cure for Leukemia and Lymphoma.
cause.name: Team In Training
